trigger.expression: {Template App Mysql Service:mysql.slave_delay[slave_delay,{$MYSQL_USER},{$MYSQL_PASSWORD},{$MYSQL_HOST}].last(0)}>20&{Template App Mysql Service:mysql.slave_delay[slave_delay,{$MYSQL_USER},{$MYSQL_PASSWORD},{$MYSQL_HOST}].min(2m)}>0&{Template App Mysql Service:mysql.slave_delay[slave_delay,{$MYSQL_USER},{$MYSQL_PASSWORD},{$MYSQL_HOST}].last(0)}#99999
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Mysql Slave delay trigger
